name: Turn the Tide
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Four 10 foot radius spheres centered on points within range erupt into holy magic. For each creature within these spheres, choose one of the following:
>The creature must make a Reflex saving throw or take 10d6 radiant damage, halved on a success.
>The creature is healed for 10d6 hit points.
empower: Radius of each sphere increased to 20 feet.
